name: Jump Pool Idle
description:
Have you always wanted to be A POOL DIVING MASTER? The time is NOW!

Manage pools in crazy locations around the world, and do frontflips, backflips, and everything in between!


- Unlock and upgrade FAMOUS people

- Do CRAZY flips

- Insane POWER-UPS to multiply your earnings!

- Become a TRILLIONAIRE !!!


Will you become the ULTIMATE pool jump tycoon ever known ???!!!
